Enter Your Feedback Here Your Feedback is Anonymous. You can provide feedback for the hospital, as well as app.
Jigme Dorji Wangchuck National Referral Hospital, Thimphu. The JDWNRH is the main hospital in Bhutan, located in the capital of Bhutan, Thimphu. It was established in 1972, and provides free basic medical treatment as well as advanced surgeries and emergency services to citizens from all over the country. It provides the most sophisticated health evaluation and management services in the country. Find A Doctor App This Android App Find A Doctor is to check the availability of doctors in the hospital especially in the JDWNRH. This App provides platform to avail the services facilitated by doctors and their availability in the hospital if users have installed this app.
User Manual This button helps user to search the doctor through their name or by their specialization.
Doctors need to enter their credentials to update their status. This feature provides information and alert the users about the latest outbreak of diseases and updates the important messages.
This feature contain list of options such as Login,About us,Help,Feedback,Rate us,Share app and More Apps. This feature provides user manual for the app users to guide them when they encounter with the problems. This section of setting is to suggest the users to share app to social media if it is found very useful and productive.
This section of the setting is to make users know more about the App and their functionality. This feature provides the platform for users to comments and give feedback for the betterment of the App. This section is to rate the App according to the services facilitated by the App to the users.
